text: Raymond H. "Ray" LaHood (born December 6, 1945) is an American politician. He served as United States Secretary of Transportation from 2009 until 2013. He is a member of the Republican Party. LaHood represented Illinois's 18th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1995 to 2009. ==References== ==Other websites== * Secretary Ray LaHood at the United States Department of Transportation * Ray LaHood on the Daily Show, December 15, 2009 * *C-SPAN Q&A; interview with LaHood, September 2, 2007 * Profile at SourceWatch * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Maronites Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:United States Secretaries of Transportation Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
